steps.name: I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 01 Check if Advertiser Accounts tab opened correctly

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
LogOut ProteusWeb from Reports Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 02 Access and View Advertiser Account Overview

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
I select a First Advertiser Account
Advertiser Account Overview screen shown
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 03 Able to search for Advertiser Account

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to EditName
Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 04 Able to see Advertiser Account Overview screen information

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to EditName
Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"
I select a First Advertiser Account
Advertiser Account details displayed on the page
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 05 Able to edit Advertiser Account details

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to EditName
I select a First Advertiser Account
Click on edit icon to change advertiser information
Update Advertiser, Agency Name and save the details
Search for Advertiser before edit name
No Advertisers returned
Search for Advertiser with updated name
Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameAfterEdit"
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 06 Option to Merge advertiser account into another

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to EditName
Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"
I select a First Advertiser Account
Option to Merge advertiser account into another exist
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 07 Option to Merge advertiser account into another

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to EditName
Advertisers filtered as per search key "AdvertiserNameBeforeEdit"
I select a First Advertiser Account
Click on Merge Into Another Advertiser Account

steps.name: Option to select Advertiser and confirm merge message shown
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly

elements.name: 08 Advertiser Platform Details shown on the Advertiser details page

steps.name: Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for a Advertiser Name "PHARMA - MAINTAIN"
Advertisers filtered as per search key "PHARMA - MAINTAIN"
I select a First Advertiser Account
Advertiser Platform details shown
Tooltip with Platform Name and Platform External ID shown on mouseover on icon
Advertiser Platforms tab opened on clicking Platform icon
LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Advertiser_Manager_Editor
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Administration" from home page
Administration page shown correctly
Able to navigate to Administration Advertiser Accounts
Search for an Advertiser to Merge
I select a First Advertiser Account
Click on Merge Into Another Advertiser Account
